title: The Translation of the Meanings of Summarized Sahih Al-Bukhari: Arabic-English
description: Sahih Al-Bukhari covers almost all aspects of life in providing proper guidance from the messenger of Allah. Translated into English in a very easy & simple language, so that all readers can understand it without difficulty. This summarized edition of Sahih Al-Bukhari has Arabic text with corresponding English translation side by side.
author: Muhammad M. Khan
